title: Waterflow
description: A comprehensive Waterworks Management System for San Jacinto, Masbate. This integrated platform revolutionizes water utility management through three interconnected applications: a main administrative system, a personnel mobile app for field operations, and a consumer web portal for bill management and service requests.
keyFeatures: AI-powered analytics for water consumption forecasting and leak detection
Personnel task management and work order assignment
Consumer self-service portal for bill payments and service requests
Multi-platform accessibility (Desktop, Mobile Web, Native Mobile)
Comprehensive reporting dashboard for municipal administrators
role: UI/UX Researcher and Designer, Lead Front-end Developer

title: JuanHotels
description: JuanHotels is a comprehensive hotel management system designed specifically for Masbate's hospitality industry. As part of the JuanTicao ecosystem, it provides an all-in-one solution for hotel and resort operations, from reservation management to guest services, tailored for Filipino hospitality businesses.
keyFeatures: Cloud-based accessibility for remote hotel management and monitoring
Integrated booking engine with real-time room availability and pricing
Comprehensive guest management system with check-in/check-out automation
Inventory management for amenities, linens, and hotel supplies
role: UI/UX Researcher and Designer, Lead Front-end Developer

title: iEnroll
description: iEnroll is a digital enrollment platform specifically designed to modernize the enrollment process for public schools across the Philippines. The system eliminates long queues and paperwork by providing a seamless online enrollment experience that's accessible to Filipino families.
keyFeatures: Multi-language support (Filipino, English) for inclusive accessibility
Step-by-step enrollment wizard with document upload capabilities
Parent portal for enrollment status monitoring
Administrative dashboard for school staff with bulk enrollment processing
role: UI/UX Researcher and Designer, Lead Front-end Developer
